column1: dailir is glossed "cleaver" in the Noldorin Word-lists
column2: and is related to the Noldorin verb daila- "to cleave" and the noun dail "axe-blade". The -ir suffix creates an "agent noun" (such as adding r to bite in English produces biter). p. 141
